https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/6RnRclsipl3cZKnDfsu0MrqWCwI.jpg This is a drama set in Nazi-occupied France at the height of World War II. Charlotte Gray tells the compelling story of a young Scottish woman working with the French Resistance in the hope of rescuing her lover, a missing RAF pilot. Based on the best-selling novel by Sebastian Faulks. Charlotte Gray
